post_title: How to present to the foreigners police online

comments.author: Constant-Security525
comments.body:
If they're closed, I doubt they'd scold you too harshly if you go on the first day they're open again. If they do, you can say you showed up and found them closed. Knocked on the door, to no avail.

I was far more delinquent and blamed the pandemic (four years ago). I was okay. 

Of course, I can't be certain, but...

It might depend on how irritable they are that day.

She should bring all necessary documents called for. I assume her passport will show her date of arrival. A date they were closed, and possibly already celebrating.

comments.author: trichaq
comments.body:
They can still fine you even if they were closed and you had no way to register, as the law doesn't account for this.

However, they are usually considerate with this and act in good faith unless you behave undesirably.
